items.name: Opulent Butterscotch Bliss Cake
items.description: Indulge in a symphony of sweet, buttery flavors layers of moist vanilla sponge cake, generously interspersed with a velvety butterscotch crush, creates blend of indulgence.

items.name: Belgium Chocolate Cake - 500 Grams
items.description: Experience chocolate indulgence with our exquisite Belgian Chocolate Cake. Each layer of moist chocolate cake is generously infused with the distinctive taste of authentic Belgian chocolate ganache, creates a blend of rich dessert

items.name: Chocolate Truffle Eggless Cake
items.description: [Eggless/Veg] Indulge in a decadent chocolate experience a chocolate sponge cake, layered with sumptuous Choco truffle, creates a symphony of cocoa flavors and velvety textures. (6 Serving, 388 calories each, protein-5g each, carbs - 53g each)

items.name: Chicken Biryani
items.description: This biryani comes with two pieces of chicken, raita, gravy and is cooked in our freshly prepared spice blend. It is moderately spicy and serves two.  [Energy: 1615.27 kcal, Protein: 61.82g, Carbohydrates: 190.89g, Fat: 64.63g])

items.name: Aloo Dum Biryani
items.description: Aloo Dum Biryani is a vegetarian delight that features tender potatoes

items.name: Meghana Special Biryani
items.description: Meghana Special Biryani is a flavorful and aromatic biryani that features succulent pieces of chicken or mutton, marinated in a blend of spices and herbs, layered with fragrant basmati rice, and cooked to perfection.

items.name: Paneer Butter Masala
items.description: Paneer Butter Masala is a rich and creamy North Indian dish made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) cooked in a luscious tomato-based gravy, flavored with butter and aromatic spices.

items.name: Paneer Tikka
items.description: Paneer Tikka is a popular Indian appetizer made with marinated paneer cubes, skewered and grilled to perfection, served with mint chutney.

items.name: Veg Biryani
items.description: Veg Biryani is a flavorful and aromatic rice dish made with basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and a blend of spices, cooked to perfection.
